sys_metadata_link.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include">
    <sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <access>package_private</access>
        <active>true</active>
        <api_name>sn_hr_sp.MessagingAppTodoPageUtils</api_name>
        <caller_access>2</caller_access>
        <client_callable>false</client_callable>
        <description/>
        <name>MessagingAppTodoPageUtils</name>
        <script><![CDATA[function MessagingAppTodoPageUtils() {}
MessagingAppTodoPageUtils.prototype = {
    initialize: function() {},

    getTodoTaskUrl: function(tableName, sysId) {
        return '?id=hrm_todo&view=sp&sysparm_tableName=' + tableName + '&sys_id=' + sysId;
    },

    getTaskType: function(tableName, sysId) {
        var taskGr = new GlideRecord(tableName);
        taskGr.get(sysId);
        return taskGr.getValue('hr_task_type');
    },

    redirectionNeeded: function(tableName, sysId) {
        if (this.getTaskType(tableName, sysId) == 'e_sign') {
            return true;
        }
        return false;
    },

    type: 'MessagingAppTodoPageUtils'
};]]></script>
        <sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name>
        <sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by>
        <sys_created_on>2022-06-27 15:56:19</sys_created_on>
        <sys_id>50efbe5ec3901110e735a78e8740dd96</sys_id>
        <sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count>
        <sys_name>MessagingAppTodoPageUtils</sys_name>
        <sys_package display_value="Employee Center Core" source="sn_hr_sp">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_package>
        <sys_policy/>
        <sys_scope display_value="Employee Center Core">3d1da2705b021200a4656ede91f91ab6</sys_scope>
        <sys_update_name>sys_script_include_50efbe5ec3901110e735a78e8740dd96</sys_update_name>
        <sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by>
        <sys_updated_on>2023-09-11 08:39:06</sys_updated_on>
    </sys_script_include>
</record_update>
